title: De Beers ' revenue 2011 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely negative which exists from 2011 to 2014.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2016 to 2018.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 2014 to 2015.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely negative which exists from 2015 to 2016.
gold: In 2018 , the revenue of diamond mining company De Beers was about 6.1 billion U.S. dollars . De Beers De Beers was founded by Cecil Rhodes in 1888 , a British businessman and politician in Southern Africa . The company is now headquarted in London .
